title: Fiery Fish Tacos with Crunchy Corn Salsa

content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1/2 cup diced red bell pepper" )

content.text: 1 cup fresh cilantro leaves, finely chopped
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 cup fresh cilantro leaves, finely chopped" )

content.text: 1) In a medium bowl, mix together corn, red onion, jicama, red bell pepper, and cilantro.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "mix"@21:24 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "corn"@34:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "red onion"@40:49 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "jicama"@51:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "red bell pepper"@59:74 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "cilantro"@80:88 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a medium bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Stir in lime juice and zest.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "lime juice"@11:21 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "zest"@26:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) In a small bowl, combine cayenne pepper, ground black pepper, and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "cayenne pepper"@28:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "ground black pepper"@44:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "salt"@69:73 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a small bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Brush each fillet with olive oil, and sprinkle with spices.
5) Arrange fillets on grill grate, and cook for 3 minutes per side.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Arrange"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-10 "fillets"@11:18 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-5-0 "grill grate"@22:33 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "cook"@39:43 / AC
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "3 minutes"@48:57 / DUR )
		:todo ( "per side"@58:66 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) For each fiery fish taco, top two corn tortillas with fish, sour cream, and corn salsa.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "top"@29:32 / AC
		:ppt ( "fish"@57:61 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "sour cream"@63:73 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "corn salsa"@79:89 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "two corn tortillas"@33:51 / FOOD )
		:subtask ( "For each fiery fish taco"@3:27 / FOOD )
	)
)
